comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Choosing a project for investment includes not being scam, as your investment in any scam project means losing your money, but also the fact that Bitgert is not a scam does not mean that it is a good investment. - Search for the developer team, are there photos or not, if there are photos, are there personal data or not, if there are no photos or the developer team is unknown and there is no necessary reason for them to be anonymous, do not invest in them. - Read the white paper. Is its data unique, or is it copied and pasted from the Internet. - Does the currency have a good future plan, is there continuous development, is the demand limits limited, or are there a lot of tokens that are printed and burned.These are general indications that if the currency fails, it is not good for investment, and practices such as theft of images, plagiarism, and the possibility of controlling tokens indicate that it is scam.
